summary:
Ysgramaer is a follower who used to be a berserker in the lands far away! Now he is going to follow only the best people in Skyrim. YOU!!!

He can be found in the Winking Skeever in Solitude
descriptionHtml:
Ysgramaer is a follower who used to be a berserker in the lands far away! Now he is going to follow only the best people in Skyrim. YOU!!!

He can be found in the Winking Skeever in Solitude

Ysgramaer can fight, steal, cook, eat, sleep, walk around, wait here, follow me, trading and all kinds off cool tricks! Give him a cookie and he will love you forever.
author: Gorbsie the Awesome
